text: Vincent Baestaens (born 18 June 1989 in Ekeren) is a Belgian cyclo-cross and road cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Cyclo-cross team Group Hens–Maes Containers. ==Major results== ;2006–2007 :1st 20px Junior race, UEC European Cyclo-cross Championships ;2008–2009 :1st 20px Under-23 race, National Cyclo- cross Championships :1st Azencross U23 ;2010–2011 :1st Duinencross Koksijde U23 :1st Cyclo-cross Kalmthout U23 :1st Gavere U23 :1st Hoogstraten U23 :1st Vlaamse Aardbeiencross U23 :1st Cyclocross Aigle U23 ;2011–2012 :1st Cyclo- cross Villarcayo ;2014–2015 :1st Cyclocross International Podbrezová, Podbrezová :1st Tage des Querfeldeinsports, Ternitz :1st Giro d'Italia Ciclocross, Rossano Veneto :1st Ciclocross del Ponte, Fae 'Di Oderzo :1st Grand Prix GEBA, Differdange ;2015–2016 :1st Ellison Park CX Festival #2 ;2019–2020 :1st Rochester Cyclocross ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Antwerp Category:People from Ekeren
title: Vincent Baestaens
